title: Creamy Sweet Potato Soup
ingredients: ['3 sweet potatoes', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 knob butter', '4 potatoes, peeled and quartered', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', '2.5L (4 pints) water', '1 1/2 tablespoons plain flour', '5 tablespoons buttermilk', '1 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
